titles.title: A bill for the relief of Fereshteh Sani.
A bill for the relief of Fereshteh Sani.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.
Committee on the Judiciary. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.
Committee on the Judiciary. Reported by Senator Hatch without amendment. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 768.

vote.text: Passed Senate without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration, Border Security, and Claims.

bill.summary: Makes Fereshteh Sani eligible for issuance of an immigrant visa or for adjustment of status to that of a lawful permanent resident of the United States under the Immigration and Nationality Act, upon payment of the required visa fees.
